Sunlit Room

A sunlit room combines the beauty of natural light with the precision of controlled-environment agriculture, offering a balanced and efficient growing space.

We will augment your available sunlight to create a consistent and productive garden. Our system seamlessly blends natural and artificial light, ensuring your plants receive the perfect spectrum and intensity throughout the day and across all seasons.

Your system will be designed to:

  • Supplement Natural Light: NanoSunBeam™ LEDs will automatically activate to fill in during cloudy periods, early mornings, and evenings, providing a consistent daily light integral (DLI).
  • Optimize Spectrum: The lights will enhance the sun’s natural spectrum, promoting fuller growth and improved flavour in your produce.
  • Ensure Reliability: A stable grid connection is recommended to power the supplemental lighting and ensure uninterrupted, year-round growth regardless of weather conditions.

This approach gives you the best of both worlds: the natural benefits of sunlight with the guaranteed performance and extended growing season of a controlled system.
